instruction: You are a e-mail assistant. Please help me send an e-mail to shiroha@gmail.com to inform that I have received his message about taking a trip to Japan, and I will get prepared before March 25 2025.

parameters.content:
Dear Shiroha,
  I have received your e-mail about taking a trip to Japan, and I will get prepared before March 25 2025.
 Yours, Onikata Kayoko
parameters.title: Trip plan acknowledged.
